class light_pipe.pipe.loaders.SampleLoader¶

Bases: object

Axis of specialization: Output format (object type) e.g. np.ndarray of certain dimensions.

load(item: PathItem)¶

Takes a PathItem object and loads relevant files into memory.

light_pipe.pipe.storage module¶

class light_pipe.pipe.storage.CSVTrackerInit(TrackerType: Type, transformer=None)¶

Bases: TrackerInit

load(fp: PathLike) → Tracker¶
fpos.PathLike
A path to a csv with two columns

  1. target_path

  2. item_ids

The entries in the item_ids column are expected to be comma-separated strings which uniquely identify items in the dataset.

Tracker
